# EmailJS Template Configuration

## Template Settings

**Template Name:** Portfolio Contact Form
**Template ID:** (will be generated by EmailJS)

## Email Template

### Subject Line:
```
New Portfolio Contact: {{from_name}} - {{from_email}}
```

## Alternative Simple Template (if HTML doesn't work)

### Subject:
```
New Portfolio Contact: {{from_name}}
```

### Body:
```
üéØ NEW PORTFOLIO CONTACT

üë§ Contact Information:
Name: {{from_name}}
Email: {{from_email}}
Date: {{sent_date}}

üí¨ Message:
{{message}}

---
üìß Reply directly to this email to respond to {{from_name}}
üíº LinkedIn: https://linkedin.com/in/danylo-morhun
üåê Sent from your portfolio contact form

Best regards,
Your Portfolio Website
```

## Template Variables Used:
- `{{from_name}}` - Sender's name
- `{{from_email}}` - Sender's email address
- `{{message}}` - The message content
- `{{sent_date}}` - Date when the message was sent

## Setup Instructions:

1. **In EmailJS Dashboard:**
   - Go to "Email Templates"
   - Click "Create New Template"
   - Copy the subject and body from above
   - Save the template

2. **Template Settings:**
   - **Template Name:** Portfolio Contact Form
   - **Subject:** Use the subject line above
   - **Content:** Use the HTML body above (or simple text version)
   - **Variables:** Make sure all variables are properly set

3. **Test the Template:**
   - Use the "Test" feature in EmailJS
   - Send a test email to yourself
   - Verify formatting and content

## Features of This Template:

‚úÖ **Professional Design** - Clean, modern layout
‚úÖ **Responsive** - Works on mobile and desktop
‚úÖ **Branded** - Uses your portfolio colors (#FFC107)
‚úÖ **Action-Oriented** - Includes reply buttons
‚úÖ **Informative** - Shows all contact details clearly
‚úÖ **Easy to Reply** - Pre-filled reply email link
‚úÖ **Fallback** - Simple text version if HTML fails

This template will make your contact form emails look professional and make it easy for you to respond to potential clients!
